field.name: handover_all_reports
field.string: 1. I have handed over all reports/assignments carried out while holding this position to my RA.

field.name: surrender_items
field.string: 2. I have surrendered all items which were entrusted to me during my employment

field.name: cleared_all_matters
field.string: 3. I have cleared all matters pertaining to advances and expenditures with the Finance department. I understand that any outstanding amounts will be deducted from my final dues.

page.h5: 1. What are the reasons for leaving?

record.field: if env.user.has_group('kw_eos.group_kw_eos_user') and \ not env.user.has_group('kw_eos.group_kw_eos_manager') and \ not env.user.has_group('kw_employee.group_hr_ra') and \ not env.user.has_group('kw_onboarding.group_kw_onboarding_finance') and \ not env.user.has_group('kw_onboarding.group_kw_onboarding_admin') and \ not env.user.has_group('kw_onboarding.group_kw_onboarding_nsa') and \ not env.user.has_group('kw_eos.group_kw_eos_officer') and \ not env.user.has_group('kw_eos.group_kw_eos_resource_head') and \ not env.user.has_group('kw_wfh.group_hr_hod') and \ not env.user.has_group('kw_eos.group_kw_eos_report_manager'): tree_view_id = env.ref('kw_eos.view_employee_exit_interview_report_tree').id form_view_id = env.ref('kw_eos.view_employee_exit_interview_report_form').id action = { 'type': 'ir.actions.act_window', 'name' : 'Feedback Report', 'view_type': 'form', 'view_mode': 'form,tree', 'views': [(tree_view_id, 'tree'), (form_view_id,'form')], 'res_model': 'employee.exit.interview', 'domain':[('employee_id.user_id','=',env.user.employee_ids.user_id.id)], } else: form_view_id = env.ref('kw_eos.eos_feedback_wizard_view').id action = { 'type': 'ir.actions.act_window', 'name' : 'Feedback Report', 'view_mode': 'form', 'view_mode': 'form', 'res_model': 'eos_feedback_wizard', 'views': [(form_view_id,'form')], 'target': 'new', }

if env.user.has_group('kw_eos.group_kw_eos_user') and \ not env.user.has_group('kw_eos.group_kw_eos_manager') and \ not env.user.has_group('kw_employee.group_hr_ra') and \ not env.user.has_group('kw_onboarding.group_kw_onboarding_finance') and \ not env.user.has_group('kw_onboarding.group_kw_onboarding_admin') and \ not env.user.has_group('kw_onboarding.group_kw_onboarding_nsa') and \ not env.user.has_group('kw_eos.group_kw_eos_officer') and \ not env.user.has_group('kw_eos.group_kw_eos_resource_head') and \ not env.user.has_group('kw_wfh.group_hr_hod') and \ not env.user.has_group('kw_eos.group_kw_eos_report_manager'): tree_view_id = env.ref('kw_eos.view_hr_employee_clearance_report_tree').id form_view_id = env.ref('kw_eos.view_hr_employee_clearance_report_form').id action = { 'type': 'ir.actions.act_window', 'name' : 'Clearance Report', 'view_type': 'form', 'view_mode': 'form,tree', 'views': [(tree_view_id, 'tree'), (form_view_id,'form')], 'res_model': 'hr.employee.clearance', 'domain':[('employee_id.user_id','=',env.user.employee_ids.user_id.id)], } else: form_view_id = env.ref('kw_eos.eos_clearance_wizard_view').id action = { 'type': 'ir.actions.act_window', 'name' : 'Clearance Report', 'view_mode': 'form', 'view_mode': 'form', 'res_model': 'eos_clearance_wizard', 'views': [(form_view_id,'form')], 'target': 'new', }
